casebody.data:
2001-2969 (La. 10/18/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Kendric LAMPLEY. No. 2002-KO-2969. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 18, 2002.

*1148In re Lampley, Kendric; Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Washington, 22nd Judicial District Court Div. E, No. 98 CR6 722252; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2000 KA 2791.

Denied.

WEIMER, J., recused.
